page.title: 10Politics
page.content: In the given area it is true to say that it is staunch "Labour". Apart from Glenboi (03.99) the area, under local boundaries is known as Aberaman South; and under county boundaries the area is known as Aberaman. The Aberaman south_ward has three out of three local councillors, (all labour); Mr. Ned McCue, Mr. William Pearson, and Mr. Peter Perry. The County ward of Aberaman returns one councillor (also Labour), Mr. Robert Reed J.P. During the 1960's the Welsh Nationalist Party, "Plaid Cymru" was strong in this area but never gained a councillor. Not every part of the area is Labour though, one part, Park View Terrace (023.003), Abercwmboi is known as "Little Moscow". One can only ask "Where's the Kremlin?".
